channel.title: [508] Changing XP Rate
channel.description:
Hello, I need some help with changing my server's Combat-XP Rate. It's not that I don't know how to change it, it's the fact that I don't know where to [b]go[/b] to change it. I am using Palidino76's server-base, if that helps any. I know what files to go to, I just don't know where in the file the XP Rate is set to.
Any help is appreciated, thnks!

item.title: [508] Changing XP Rate
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Palidino76>rs2>player>combat>playerCombat.java

then search for XPRate

Read full topic
